Posts.EditableText: I've tried adding music but it hasn't work. Any tips?
Posts.HTML: I've tried adding music but it hasn't work. Any tips?

Posts.EditableText:
Can you share what you have tried so we can help you debug it?

This JavaScript should play an audio file:

```
var audio = new Audio('audio_file.mp3');
audio.play();
```

Does some version of that work for you?
